name: claude-skills
description: A collection of Claude Code skills providing specialized capabilities through modular plugins.

plugins.name: project-readme-author
plugins.description: Create, modify, validate, and optimize README.md files following GitHub best practices.

plugins.name: project-logo-author
plugins.description: Generates professional logos with native transparent backgrounds. Requires mcp-openrouter MCP server. Use when asked to 'generate a logo' or 'create logo'.

plugins.name: bash-output-styler
plugins.description: Applies gorgeous terminal styling to bash scripts using gum with ANSI fallback.

plugins.name: python-output-styler
plugins.description: Applies gorgeous terminal styling to Python scripts using Rich with plain-text fallback.

plugins.name: project-spec-extractor
plugins.description: Analyzes a codebase and generates a pure requirements specification (SPEC.md) with no implementation details.
